Class ActivityRecognitionUpdatesReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • IActivityRecognitionResponseListener.Stub
      • org.hardroid.client.ActivityRecognitionUpdatesReceiver

  • public class ActivityRecognitionUpdatesReceiver
extends IActivityRecognitionResponseListener.Stub
    This class provides interaction with the alarm manager in order to periodically get activity recognition results
